<h3>Most recent changes:</h3>
<table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
    <thead>
        <tr>
            <th>Event</th>
            <th>Initiated</th>
            <th>User</th>
        </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
        <tr ng-repeat="history in bucket.history">
            <td>{[history.event]}</td>
            <td>{[history.initiated]}</td>
            <td>{[history.user]}</td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table>
